content:
OpenFlags Enum

Definition

Specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum OpenFlags
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
OpenFlags

Remarks

The ReadOnly, ReadWrite, and MaxAllowed flags are mutually exclusive. The OpenExistingOnly flag is the only flag that does not require the StorePermissionFlags permission to be granted.

Fields

IncludeArchived

Open the X.509 certificate store and include archived certificates.
MaxAllowed

Open the X.509 certificate store for the highest access allowed.
OpenExistingOnly

Opens only existing stores; if no store exists, the stem.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open* method will not create a new store.
ReadOnly

Open the X.509 certificate store for reading only.
ReadWrite

Open the X.509 certificate store for both reading and writing.
